articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: PV Sindhu on giving fans 'mini heart attack', intense rivalry with Saina and quest for Olympic gold - Times Now
articles.description: In an exclusive interaction with Times Now Digital, World champion PV Sindhu spoke at length about her 'I RETIRE’ post, intense rivalry with Saina Nehwal, and her quest for the Olympic gold in the Tokyo Games.
